description: LimitResponse defines how to handle requests that can not be executed right now.

queuing.description: `queuing` holds the configuration parameters for queuing. This field may be non-empty only if `type` is `"Queue"`.

type.description: `type` is "Queue" or "Reject". "Queue" means that requests that can not be executed upon arrival are held in a queue until they can be executed or a queuing limit is reached. "Reject" means that requests that can not be executed upon arrival are rejected. Required.
